note.p: Career: Worked in the office of the Board of Trade and Plantations; was nominated Lieutenant Governor of New Jersey; Governor of Massachusetts (1757); transferred to South Carolina, resigned (1760); MP Tregony (1767-1774), Minehead (1774-1780)
Notes: There are several Walcots in Gazetteer - probably the one in Lincolnshire, given his birth place (DNB does not specify).
